title: AdaniConneX in talks with banks to raise $900-950 million
description: AdaniConneX secures $900-950 million loan from MUFG Bank for 1 GW data centre expansion in multiple Indian cities. The loan, with an interest rate above SOFR, aims to support Adani Group's venture into the data centre business.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
